DOC.brief_summary: This study describe phenotype ( physical behavioral trait ) overweight obese people . It characterize hormone , metabolism , food preference , fitness physical activity level , sleep pattern think process people without weight problem . Genetic material collect study internal code influence body weight . People 18 year age weight category ( lean , overweight , obese ) reasonably healthy may eligible study . Participants undergo follow test procedure : - Physical exam , electrocardiogram , blood urine test , instruction record food intake 7 day - Metabolic study menstruate woman . - Resting metabolic rate study many calorie body burns rest . - Mixed meal test measure hormones insulin regulate blood sugar . - Glucose tolerance test determine sensitive body insulin . - 24-hour energy expenditure measure amount oxygen breathe amount carbon dioxide breathe . - Repeat 24-hour energy expenditure . - Diurnal blood sample temperature assessment study body internal clock . - Air-displacement plethysmography ( Bod Pod ) measure body composition . - Dual energy x-ray absortiometry ( DEXA ) measure body fat bone density . - Repeat Bod Pod DEXA . - Anthropometric measurement bioelectrical impedance measure height , weight , circumference , skinfold thickness , fluid status percentage body fat . - Bromide dilution measure amount water cell body . - Doubly label water measure amount calorie burn 7-day period . - 24-hour diet report . - Endothelial reactivity measure blood vessel stretch dilate assess cardiovascular health . - Treadmill bicycle exercise capacity test . - Physical activity monitor . - Unicorder detect breathe difficulty may interfere sleep . - Fat muscle biopsy look variation gene expression fat tissue muscle . - Neurocognitive test check memory , decision-making , hand-eye coordination , reason . - Evaluation mood problem assess personality type . - Evaluation ass quantity quality pain experience . - Taste test determine response bitter , salty , sweet sour substance . - Occupational therapy evaluation explore subject adaptation , , perform personal , social professional activity ; subject view weight , body size shape , strategy control weight .
DOC.brief_title: Physical Behavioral Traits Overweight Obese Adults
DOC.detailed_description: Although complex metabolic , hormonal , neural network operate control body weight , obesity case , result over-feeding inactivity . In majority obese patient , pattern fundamental behavior determine success failure weight loss intervention . Behavior control degree conscious decision making influenced signal integrate network involve body weight regulation . The contribution behavior , environment , socioeconomic status , physiology genetics assure single therapeutic regimen successful obese individual . In order explore factor impede weight loss result weight regain , obese phenotype variant must define . The purpose study detail hormonal , metabolic , cognitive behavioral trait across spectrum weight category utilize state-of the-art facility Metabolic Units Mark O. Hatfield Clinical Research Center , NIH . Genetic material bank analysis phenotypic subgroup emerge . Patients age 18 eligible study . While childhood obesity important public health issue , variables growth hormonal control delineate separate study . Over-weight obese patient encourage participate full evaluation feasible . Lean individual recruit create normative database body composition ( dual energy x-ray absortiometry , air displacement plethysmography ) , energy expenditure ( rest energy expenditure , 24h respiratory chamber doubly label water ) technique use study trait importance . The study conduct inpatient outpatient set include evaluation hormone , diurnal variation , sleep , eat behavior taste perception , physical fitness , psychological neurocognitive functioning . Importantly , protocol mean pilot data obtain develop novel approach hypothesis study obesity associate trait .
DOC.criteria: INCLUSION CRITERIA : Obese subject : 1 . Obese men woman age 18 year ; 2 . BMI great 30 ; Overweight subject : 1 . Overweight men woman age 18 year ; 2 . BMI great 25 less 30 Control subject ( may match age , sex year education ) : 1 . Normal weight men woman age 18 year ; 2 . BMI great 18.5 less 25 EXCLUSION CRITERIA : 1 . Patients significant physical limitation may preclude complete majority test study . 2 . Current , unstable medical condition include cardiac ischemia ; severe respiratory insufficiency require oxygen therapy ; hepatic cardiac failure assess history physical exam ; 3 . Any psychiatric condition would preclude participation study ; 4 . Patients unwilling unable give inform consent . Additional exclusion lean control subject : 1 . Previous history obesity adolescent adult ; 2 . Current past history eat disorder anorexia nervosa bulimia . Exclusions cannabis user control : 1 . Dependence drug nicotine , caffeine cannabis , within past 6 month 2 . Any history intravenous illegal drug use 3 . Alcohol use 5 drink per day , 3 day week ; 15 drink per week 4 . History hepatitis B C current hepatitis A , B C , liver disease associate steatosis 5 . HIV 6 . History diabetes ( type 1 type 2 ) polycystic ovary disease condition may confound study result 7 . Professional collegiate athlete participation 60 minute per day vigorous exercise 8 . Use prescribed counter herbal/alternative medications/ preparation effect glucose lipid metabolism oral contraceptive 9 . Pregnancy lactation 10 . Any condition physical attribute would interfere MRI study e.g . claustrophobia , cochlear implant , metal fragment eye , certain type tattoo metal implant body
